reviewText: Love this series especially with Johnny.  He encourages but isn't bugging you all the time.  They are a good pace, nice scenery and for me 35 minutes on my elliptical is all I can do at least for now.  Just wish he would do a Paris one.  I have several of this series and no dud yet.
You could be walking anyplace, few vista views.

Great job.  I enjoy the evening walks.  I feel that the pace of this one is a bit much for an order person or beginner.  Also, it would be nice to have it in sections in order to choose the walks and not start-over for the whole program.  I enjoy the scenery and would love a few breaks to view the panorama.

I was looking forward to watching this as i am on the treadmill in the mornings but it would not work, i tried cleaning the dvd and my husband also tried to get it to work but it refuses. i will try and find one in a store around town.
I love the Virtual Active DVD's. I like that they give you the option to work out to a guide or without one. Love the opportunity to travel the world right from my treadmill. This one is spectacular!

Great scenery - very enjoyable to walk to.  As mentioned, I had back surgery and the MD told me to walk as much as possible.  Thanks to this DVD and the others I purchased, it helped make my treadmill and elliptical a little more bearable.  I had the surgery in January and live in PA - so walking outside with ice, weather, etc. wasn't an option.  Thanks for the fast shipping also.

This is my favorite virtual fitness DVD. It's a virtual hike but I actually jog to it. The camera movement is smooth and keeps going at a fast enough pace that it's really more like jogging than hiking.  Seeing the other people is also interesting - so the time passes by.

Johnny is a great motivator and seems to say the perfect thing at just the right time. I also enjoyed the sound track which matches the hike perfectly.

I look forward to more DVDs from the series.

This is the first of many videos I will buy from this company.  High definition and superb photography.  My time on the treadmill flew by as I took a brisk hike through the beautiful German forests.  Buy this video.  You will not be disappointed!
